- Well, yeah, I mean, for me,
I wouldn't have gotten as close as I did

with Brendan, Eli and Robin,
like without this event.

- I think in general,
it was another tremendous Big Data Bowl.

You know, we more or less
set the Kaggle record

for an analytics contest with
a number of participants.
We had over 200 folks involved.

We integrated PFF data for

Eric and folks over there,
thank you for allowing us to do that.

I do think the future

It's blending both of those together

You know, our judges were a great blend

of data science expertise,
the NFL playing experience.

So thank you to our judges
of this year's event.
Thank you to AWS for being our sponsor.
Thanks to Kaggle for hosting.

And we hope to be back

So thanks again, everyone

- Congratulations to our
